testcase.name: user place order for hoodies
testcase.system-out: Given user click on "Men"...................................................passed And user click on "Hoodies & Sweatshirts" from section "Tops"...............passed And user click on "Ajax Full-Zip Sweatshirt"................................passed And user click on "XS"......................................................passed And user click on "Blue" color..............................................passed And user click on "Add to Cart".............................................passed And user click on "shopping cart"...........................................passed When user click on "Proceed to Checkout" button.............................passed And user enter random 10 char into shipping address "First Name"............passed And user enter random 10 char into shipping address "Last Name".............passed And user enter random 10 char into shipping address "Company"...............passed And user enter random 10 char into shipping address "Street Address"........passed And user enter random 10 char into shipping address "City"..................passed And user click on "Please select a region, state or province."..............passed And user click on "Texas"...................................................passed And user enter random 10 char into shipping address "Zip/Postal Code".......passed And user enter random 10 char into shipping address "Phone Number"..........passed And user click on "Fixed"...................................................passed And user click on "Next"....................................................passed
